data.strFullDescription:
[img width="616" height="71"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/8bc45a145c0c65d8460bb216118846ab.avif?t=1730921112[/img]

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/392bda1b75baba9dfd3a7c1cbff06e2f.poster.avif?t=1730921112" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/392bda1b75baba9dfd3a7c1cbff06e2f.webm?t=1730921112" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/392bda1b75baba9dfd3a7c1cbff06e2f.webp?t=1730921112" width="616" height="250"][/imgvid]
為客戶建造迷你房屋：打造獨特且舒適的輪式迷你家。根據客戶的喜好量身定制每個房屋，並融入你的個人風格。從質樸的小木屋到精簡的極簡設計，可能性無限！

[img width="616" height="71"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/ea1c8f1a95a54f0fd59c28362e4f54fe.avif?t=1730921112[/img]

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/1dd2f6f5e9d2d49d9e0dd1253de79749.poster.avif?t=1730921112" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/1dd2f6f5e9d2d49d9e0dd1253de79749.webm?t=1730921112" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/1dd2f6f5e9d2d49d9e0dd1253de79749.webp?t=1730921112" width="616" height="250"][/imgvid]
展開一場冒險，探索一個充滿活力且多樣化的小島，每個角落都會帶來驚喜。可以探索西海岸的熱鬧小鎮，在島中央的寧靜湖泊旁放鬆，或前往東南方的山區。

[img width="616" height="71"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/c20c5508d4dfef40d9d8f11d36fc96fa.avif?t=1730921112[/img]

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/9f17644b8bb617b153167e028e663d75.poster.avif?t=1730921112" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/9f17644b8bb617b153167e028e663d75.webm?t=1730921112" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/9f17644b8bb617b153167e028e663d75.webp?t=1730921112" width="616" height="250"][/imgvid]
掌控你如何發展業務，設計你的迷你房屋，並在Tiny Island上漫遊。開放世界的遊戲玩法提供無數的機會和體驗，滿足你的個人風格。

[img width="616" height="71"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/5c62998634b83f5cafdc296c133946be.avif?t=1730921112[/img]

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/cfe902188e749e87a1c3f14eb524e8e9.poster.avif?t=1730921112" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/cfe902188e749e87a1c3f14eb524e8e9.webm?t=1730921112" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/cfe902188e749e87a1c3f14eb524e8e9.webp?t=1730921112" width="616" height="250"][/imgvid]
將你的創作連接到可靠的車輛，並將其送達島上的滿意客戶。穿越蜿蜒的道路、風景如畫的路線和具有挑戰性的地形以達到你的目的地。

[img width="616" height="71"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/c357ba5b5948c9efd7a1c4dc6b3e187d.avif?t=1730921112[/img]

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/9e54439ec1b2a7731a6db528e5f08a56.poster.avif?t=1730921112" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/9e54439ec1b2a7731a6db528e5f08a56.webm?t=1730921112" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/9e54439ec1b2a7731a6db528e5f08a56.webp?t=1730921112" width="616" height="250"][/imgvid]
管理並擴展你的迷你房屋事業。利用辛苦賺來的收入來提升你的工作坊、投資更好的車輛，或在當地賭場碰碰運氣。努力打造更大更壯觀的房子！

[img width="616" height="71"]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/2c76d3e0ab049e7b440994f90345cb0b.avif?t=1730921112[/img]

[imgvid poster.avif="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/5947fa6356bf2f5f3d13aafcd251776c.poster.avif?t=1730921112" webm="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/5947fa6356bf2f5f3d13aafcd251776c.webm?t=1730921112" webp="https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/3191990/extras/5947fa6356bf2f5f3d13aafcd251776c.webp?t=1730921112" width="616" height="250"][/imgvid]
欣賞令人驚嘆的自然景觀和地標，包括一個嘉年華區、山丘上的風車和小島上的燈塔。可以在沙灘上放鬆，或探索位於西南方的熱鬧機場。

你準備好迎接終極迷你房屋挑戰了嗎？開始這段溫馨的旅程，將你的小規模願望轉變為繁榮的事業！  
今天就在Steam上獲得Tiny House Simulator，開始打造你的夢想家園！
data.strSnippet: 在這個放鬆的開放世界建造遊戲中，為各種客戶設計並建造定制的迷你家。創造量身定制的獨特空間，並透過沙盒模式探索不同的布局，實現絕對的創意自由。

vecUnachieved.strDescription: Build and complete your first tiny house.
Use the same space as both a kitchen and a living room.
Place your tiny house with a mountain or lake view.
Get a perfect rating from a customer on a house project.
Demolish interior walls in a tiny house.
Fix a tiny house has been completely taken over by books!
Sell a tiny house and earn 10,000 units of profit.
Sell a tiny house and earn 25,000 units of profit.
Create a tiny house with features for pets, like a cat tree or dog bed.
Complete the gym renovation by following all the sports coach’s instructions and creating the perfect workout space.
